name: Wally and Bugs Save the World
name_original: Wally and Bugs Save the World
description:
Play as a trouble-making pup named Wally, whose wild imagination takes you on a one of a kind adventure, full of mystery, action, and drama. Of course it isn't truly adventure without a friend to share it with. Wally's trusty sidekick Bugs is always by his side no matter the call!

Warning: game music can be loud.

Music is not my own.

Intruder alert in 8-bit - Gang Garrison 2

My Best Friend is a Dog -Pix
